title: How’s the Taste?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>It’s Nico’s specialty, Nico Nico Cream Puffs! Help yourself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thanks for the meal. *munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>How’s the taste? Well, I know even if I don’t ask!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>*munch munch*.... *munch munch*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yep, it seems like it’s delicious! But I already knew that, though!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>*munch*.... Umm, it’s really delicious. I’m.... going to draw a Rina-chan’s board right now.... so please wait<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? It’s fine. I can tell<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You.... can?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>When you’re eating it so enthusiastically like that, of course I can! Nico is a genius at making sweets after all, huh~! Come on, go ahead and eat more<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay.... thanks for the meal!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
